name: Slackinviter
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACKINVITER_SLACKTOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/web)

SLACKINVITER_SLACKTEAM.description: The name of your Slack team (e.g. https://<YOUR-TEAM>.slack.com)

SLACKINVITER_INVITETOKEN.description: Optional token to require users to enter

SLACKINVITER_DISABLECOC.description: Optionally remove the Code of Conduct checkbox (enter 'true' to remove)
